Membership
Begin Mini-Page 20096
This is where you belong...
Whether you’re hitting the links, attending an exclusive social event or perfecting your tennis game, Breakers West offers distinctive memberships that open the door to the inviting lifestyle of this intimate West Palm Beach country club.
Rees Jones Summer Membership
May 1 - September 30, 2025
Enjoy championship golf on The Breakers Rees Jones® Course, play pickleball or tennis and dine at our private Grille Room. You'll also have full access to the club’s expansive Sport & Activity Complex, featuring our resort-style infinity pool, interactive Kids’ Club, fitness center and classes—plus, enjoy an array of memorable social activities.
LEARN MORE
APPLY NOW
Rees Jones Membership
Annual
Our annual Rees Jones Membership entitles you to the full range of membership privileges at our scenic and serene country club. Enjoy championship golf on the Rees Jones® Course, play pickleball and dine at our Grille Room. You'll also have full access to the club’s expansive Sport & Activity Complex, featuring our resort-style infinity pool, seven Har-Tru tennis courts, interactive Kids’ Club and state-of-the-art fitness center—plus, enjoy an array of memorable year-round social events.
June through August, your membership also provides summer access to the The Breakers Beach Club and historic Ocean Golf Course.
Year-round, you’ll enjoy exclusive member discounts on accommodations, shopping, dining, spa services and more at The Breakers Palm Beach.
REQUEST INFO
Sport & Social Membership
Annual
The Sport & Social Membership is designed for those who wish to participate in the many social aspects of our intimate country club. In particular, this membership provides access to our resort-style pool, fitness center, noteworthy dining and ongoing social activities, along with access to the Breakers West Kids’ Club, complimentary court time on our Har-Tru courts and pickleball courts, plus access to top-level instruction from our world-class tennis academy.
June through August, your membership also provides summer access to the famed Breakers Beach Club and historic Ocean Golf Course.
Year-round, you’ll enjoy exclusive member discounts on accommodations, shopping, dining, spa services and more at The Breakers Palm Beach
REQUEST INFO
Membership at The Breakers Ocean Club
Annual
Four glittering pools, six whirlpool spas, 10 restaurants, a promenade of 13 shopping boutiques - it’s all at your fingertips when you choose to become an esteemed Ocean Club member. Experience exclusive perks, including preferred accommodation rates and discounts at The Breakers’ shops, restaurants and spa, plus gratis green fees at both the Ocean Course and Rees Jones Course.
OCEAN CLUB
End Mini-Page 20096

WEDDINGS & EVENTS
Begin Mini-Page 20099
Happily ever after begins here...
No matter how grand or intimate the occasion, Breakers West Country Club promises to make your wedding or special event one to celebrate long after the last guest leaves.
Events that live up to the occasion
From intimate, informal family gatherings to elaborate, one-of-a-kind wedding celebrations, engaging business meetings to legendary golf tournaments and the most talked-about social events of the season, Breakers West combines incomparable food, impeccable service and an unwavering eye for detail with the picturesque backdrop of lush landscaping. Create an unparalleled experience your guests will treasure long after your event has ended.
VIEW PHOTO TOUR
You say, “I do.” We’ll do the rest.
It’s the details that make Breakers West one of the most sought-after wedding venues in West Palm Beach. Plan your signature day with a ceremony at one of our scenic indoor or outdoor settings. Host a rehearsal dinner, engagement party or lavish reception in our elegant ballroom. For 20 to 170 guests, we’ll make your special day spectacular with exceptional food, attentive service, and unforgettable details, including:
- Five-hour Signature Bar (upgrades available)
- Cocktail Reception with Butler-Passed Hors d’Oeuvres and Specialty Stations
- Plated Dinners, Served Tableside or Station Style
- Custom Wedding Cake Design Services
- Wine Service with Dinner and Champagne Toast
SUBMIT WEDDING INQUIRY
Make your special event truly special
Some of the most memorable social events begin with a Breakers West venue. Choose from our menu of customizable packages, ranging from:
- Baby or Bridal Showers
- Plated and Buffet Luncheons
- Birthday and Anniversary Celebrations
- Bar and Bat Mitzvahs
- Graduation Parties
- Golf Outings
- Corporate Events
- Holiday Parties
- Private Events
SUBMIT SPECIAL EVENT INQUIRY
{Photos by Chris Kruger Photography}
End Mini-Page 20099
